title: Rellekka Rooftop Course

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Rellekka Rooftop Agility Course is available to players with an Agility level of 80 or higher. It is preceded by the Pollnivneach Rooftop Course and followed by the Ardougne Rooftop Course.

content:
Rellekka Rooftop Course
Released5 December 2013 (Update)
MembersYes
LocationRellekka
Map
Advanced data
Typeagility course
Location on World Map
Lighthouse ← Agility course → Fremennik Slayer Dungeon
↓
Seers' Village

The Rellekka Rooftop Agility Course is available to players with an Agility level of 80 or higher. It is preceded by the Pollnivneach Rooftop Course and followed by the Ardougne Rooftop Course.

At level 85 Agility, players stops failing at the first tightrope. At level 89 Agility, players stop failing the second leap gap too, thus never failing on the course.

A full lap of this agility course can be done in roughly 51 seconds, making the maximum amount of experience possible 55,052.4 XP/hour assuming perfect laps. This, however, is only attainable with the Fremennik elite diary done and the boots in the inventory which allows for 70 laps/hour. Keeping this rate is very difficult to achieve and a player should rather count on getting around 50k XP/hour.

Using this course alone, levelling up from level 80 to 90 would require 4308 completions of the course, meaning roughly 61 hours of training at the maximum hourly rate.

Marks of Grace spawn on the Rellekka course at a rate of roughly 1 mark per 5 minutes. At maximum efficiency, one can expect 10-12 marks per hour.

Experience per obstacle
Image Obstacle Experience
Rough wall 20
Gap 30
Tightrope 40
Gap 85
Gap 25
Tightrope 105
Pile of fish 475
Total 780

At level 85 Agility, players stops failing at the first tightrope. At level 89 Agility, players stop failing the second leap gap too, thus never failing on the course.

A full lap of this agility course can be done in roughly 51 seconds, making the maximum amount of experience possible 55,052.4 XP/hour assuming perfect laps. This, however, is only attainable with the Fremennik elite diary done and the boots in the inventory which allows for 70 laps/hour. Keeping this rate is very difficult to achieve and a player should rather count on getting around 50k XP/hour.

Using this course alone, levelling up from level 80 to 90 would require 4308 completions of the course, meaning roughly 61 hours of training at the maximum hourly rate.

Marks of Grace spawn on the Rellekka course at a rate of roughly 1 mark per 5 minutes. At maximum efficiency, one can expect 10-12 marks per hour.
